00015 /* $Id: dfrig.h 4932 2007-09-07 17:17:23Z bmribler $ */
00016 
00017 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018  * File:    dfrig.h
00019  * Purpose: header file for the Raster Image set
00020  * Invokes: df.h
00021  * Contents:
00022  *  Structure definitions: DFRdr, DFRrig
00023  * Remarks: This is included with user programs which use RIG
00024  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00025 
00026 #ifndef DFRIG   /* avoid re-inclusion */
00027 #define DFRIG
00028 
00029 /* description record: used to describe image data, palette data etc. */
00030 typedef struct
00031   {
00032       int16       ncomponents;  /* Number of components */
00033       int16       interlace;    /* data ordering: chunky / planar etc */
00034       int32       xdim;         /* X-dimension of data */
00035       int32       ydim;         /* Y-dimensionsof data */
00036       DFdi        nt;           /* number type of data */
00037       DFdi        compr;        /* compression */
00038       /* ### Note: compression is currently uniquely described with a tag.
00039          No data is attached to this tag/ref.  But this capability is
00040          provided for future expansion, when this tag/ref might point to
00041          some data needed for decompression, such as the actual encodings */
00042   }
00043 DFRdr;
00044 
00045 /* structure to hold RIG info */
00046 typedef struct
00047   {
00048       char       *cf;           /* color format */
00049       int32       xpos;         /* X position of image on screen */
00050       int32       ypos;         /* Y position of image on screen */
00051       float32     aspectratio;  /* ratio of pixel height to width */
00052       float32     ccngamma;     /* gamma color correction parameters */
00053       float32     ccnred[3];    /* red color correction parameters */
00054       float32     ccngrren[3];  /* green color correction parameters */
00055       float32     ccnblue[3];   /* blue color correction parameters */
00056       float32     ccnwhite[3];  /* white color correction parameters */
00057       DFdi        image;        /* image */
00058       DFRdr       descimage;    /* image data description */
00059       DFdi        lut;          /* color look-up table (palette) */
00060       DFRdr       desclut;      /* look-up table description */
00061       DFdi        mattechannel; /* matte? */
00062       DFRdr       descmattechannel;     /* Description of matte? */
00063   }
00064 DFRrig;
00065 
00066 /* dimensions of raster-8 image */
00067 typedef struct R8dim
00068   {
00069       uint16      xd;
00070       uint16      yd;
00071   }
00072 R8dim;
00073 
00074 #endif /*DFRIG */
